CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Strategic_Index__c, "Not Acknowledged")), 1, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Strategic_Index__c, "Tactical")), 2, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Strategic_Index__c, "Occasionally Strategic")), 3, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Strategic_Index__c, "Situationally Strategic")), 4, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Strategic_Index__c, "Intentionally Strategic")), 5, 0 )))))
/* original formulaCASE( Strategic_Index__c , "Not Acknowledged", 1, "Tactical", 2,"Occasionally Strategic",3,"Situationally Strategic",4,"Intentionally Strategic",5,0)*/
CustomField.label: Strategic Index Score
